definition: A term used to describe a shape or object that possesses equal sides and angles, forming a right angle at each corner. It is commonly employed when discussing geometric properties or when referring to objects with a square-like appearance.

examples.english: The room has a square shape.

examples.german: Der Tisch hat eine quadratische Tischplatte.
examples.english: The table has a square tabletop.

examples.german: Die Fliesen auf dem Boden sind quadratisch.
examples.english: The tiles on the floor are square.

examples.german: Das Bild an der Wand ist in einem quadratischen Rahmen.
examples.english: The picture on the wall is in a square frame.

examples.german: Die quadratischen Kissen passen gut zur Einrichtung.
examples.english: The square cushions match the decor well.
